description:
And explore a mysterious temple complex filled with devious new traps.

INCLUDES 21 NEW MAPS
Sprint across ancient bridges before they crumble beneath your feet, slide over spinning platforms, and smear your unsuspecting enemies across the floor with a giant block of butter. 

4 EXCLUSIVE CHARACTERS
• Chocolate: the sweet assailant who’s missing a few squares.
• Jello: this cute contestant will wibble-wobble its way to victory.
• Grapes: the courageous cluster that’s more than the sum of its parts.
• Salt & Pepper: a dynamic duo who work best together.
name: Just Desserts DLC
